skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.Transport
skill.description: For an agent to know how to transport a set of transportable entities. Entities are visited in the order of the list and are loaded on the agent. Once all elements are loaded (some entities could not be loaded), the agent moves toward issued destination and unload transported entities, one by one.

parameter.name: entitiesToTransport
parameter.description: The transportable entities to transport toward the given destination.

link.name: unload
link.description: To move toward destination and then to unload loaded entities.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when no more element left to transport.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent once the agent visited all element to transport and if it wasn't able to load any of them.
